metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3467 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Debian-edu-config all versions < 2.11.10, a set of configuration files usedfor Debian Edu, and debian-lan-config < 0.26, configured too permissiveACLs for the Kerberos admin server, which allowed password changes forother Kerberos user principals.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3467` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

debian-lan-config - 0.26
No subscription required

criterions.comment: debian-lan-config package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.26').
